EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_Denver Startup Week_Q316.Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Confirmation - Thank you
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://pivotal.io/event/cloud-brews-denver]]> Thank you for registering for Denver Startup Week Cloud Brews. Please see event details below:
Date & Time: Wednesday, September 14th, 5:00 - 8:00 PM Location: Pivotal Denver, 1644 Platte Street, Denver, CO 80202
{{my.Save the Date}}
Questions? Please contact Jennifer Donahue at jdonahue@pivotal.io <[[mailto:jdonahue@pivotal.io]]>.
